The claim originated from a news portal: which published an article stating that SP leader Azam Khan made the statement about taking 'Jal Samadhi' if not invited to the Bhoomi Pujan of Ram Mandir.
The right: wing portal Swarajya also tweeted and published the news without verification, adding to its spread.
However: it was discovered that the claim was a case of mistaken identity, as the person who made the statement was Kunwar Mohd. Azam Khan, the President of Shri Ram Mandir Nirman Muslim Karsevak Manch, and not the SP leader Azam Khan.
